sp_widget.name: CMS Home Page Title
sp_widget.template:
Welcome to Case Management

About Application


This Application is a part of Harbourvest Application, In here Harbourvest has internal departments like Accounting and Compliance Team. They use a case management application for processing questions and clarifications within each department. Requests are raised in Appian, with specific emails for each department. Requestors select reviewers and other functional teams for approval. Responses are sent via email, and recurring requests can be assigned to requestors.


Create a Request
